name: Covéa
goal: As a mutual insurance group, Covéa operates in the field of non-life, life and health insurance. The Covéa group brings together 3 major brands in France: MAAF, MMA and GMF. With more than 26,000 employees, the group achieved in 2018 a turnover of 16.9 billion euros and represents 11.5 million members and customers.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Competition, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Employment and Social Affairs, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Single market, Taxation
euInitiatives: Solvency II (Revision) ; CMU ; Motor Insurance Directive (Revision) ; Brexit ; ESAs Review ; Mobility Package (Connected and autonomous vehicles) ; Sustainable finance ; Long term investment ; E-privacy ; General safety regulation
